Title: AI Agent's Toolbox - Semantic Kernel meets MCP and Python
Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
In this episode, we continue our journey into the Semantic Kernel AI Agents Toolbox, focusing on how to build intelligent agents using MCP Servers and Python. Join us as Evan Mattson walks through three hands-on demos that showcase:

How MCP tools are invoked when constructing AI agents with Semantic Kernel. Using the GitHub MCP Server Using the Microsoft Learn MCP Server. A practical look at how Azure AI Foundry fits into the picture. Whether you're just getting started or looking to deepen your understanding of Semantic Kernel and MCP, this episode offers practical insights and real-world examples to help you build more capable AI agents.

Please watch the part 1 "Building AI Agent Workflows with Semantic Kernel" here https://youtu.be/3JFKwerYj04
